collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (3 total Queries, 3 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT * FROM tbl_berita where status_berita = '2' ORDER BY created_at desc limit 3

SELECT * FROM tbl_wawasan_islami as a INNER JOIN tbl_user as b on a.id_user = b.id INNER join tbl_kategori_wawasan_islami as c on a.id_kategori_wawasan_islami = c.id_kategori_wawasan_islami where a.status_wawasan_islami = '2' ORDER BY a.created_at desc limit 3
SELECT * FROM tbl_kutipan where status_kutipan = '1' ORDER BY created_at desc limit 1
